body_html: Is there a way to achieve this even by using a batch of size 1? Each batch would contain 1 sentence, however, the ksize in max pooling needs to be set dynamically since it would depend on the length of the input. Any ideas?

body: Is there a way to achieve this even by using a batch of size 1? Each batch would contain 1 sentence, however, the ksize in max pooling needs to be set dynamically since it would depend on the length of the input. Any ideas?
